Methods in essentials that return PolarPoint
 PolarPoint Scanner.getLightLocation()
          Transforms the light reading into a distance using a regression equation we figured out in the experimental work.

Methods in essentials with parameters of type PolarPoint
 void ObstacleListener.objectFound(PolarPoint objectLocation)
          This method will be called when the obstacle detector finds an obstacle, whether through a touch sensor or an ultrasonic sensor.
 void Navigator.objectFound(PolarPoint p)
          When an object is found in the obstacle detector, this method implements the obstacle avoiding stuff.
